statements: SELECT * FROM StockHistory;
SELECT id, product_name, inventory_level, timestamp FROM StockHistory;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM StockHistory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM StockHistory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, inventory_level FROM StockHistory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) FROM StockHistory GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT SUM(inventory_level) AS total_inventory, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month FROM StockHistory GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE inventory_level < 50 OR inventory_level > 200 ORDER BY inventory_level ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT quantity, timestamp FROM StockHistory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) FROM StockHistory GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products JOIN StockHistory ON Products.product_id = StockHistory.product_id WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.timestamp FROM Products p JOIN StockHistory s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Products JOIN StockHistory ON Products.product_id = StockHistory.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT * FROM StockHistory ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, description FROM Product WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT date, inventory_level FROM StockHistory WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, product_id, date, quantity FROM InventoryRecords ORDER BY date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE name LIKE '%chocolate%' AND description ILIKE '%tasty%';
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(inventory_level) AS avg_inventory FROM StockHistory GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT Product.name, InventoryRecords.quantity FROM Product JOIN InventoryRecords ON Product.id = InventoryRecords.product_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM StockHistory
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE change_type = 'increase' ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE change_type = 'reduction';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price, timestamp FROM StockHistory;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM StockHistory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT id, product_name, timestamp FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity = 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM StockHistory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND price > 20 ORDER BY price DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM StockHistory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
